title: Font where capital R leg descends below baseline.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122090259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lee-01_4515.jpg)

This is the only picture i have for reference and can not for the life of me find out what this is.  
Thanks,
author: Boyeamc

comments.content:
Perhaps compressed & edited to extend the R? Seems that base font is wider, but small scale and lack of earmark letters makes me hesitant to suggest a match.  
Don
